duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harm
duas.translation: O Allah, place me under Your protection.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Worries
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve my worries.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
duas.translation: O Allah, teach me what benefits me.

duas.title: Dua for Easing Hardships
duas.translation: O Allah, make my hardships easy.

duas.title: Dua for Finding True Happiness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me everlasting happiness.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah's Guidance
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Devil
duas.arabic: اللهم أعوذ بك من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the accursed devil.

duas.title: Dua for Peace of Mind
duas.translation: O Allah, make my mind at peace.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah's Mercy
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy on me with Your power.

duas.title: Dua for the Children
duas.translation: O Allah, make my children among the righteous.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Poverty
duas.translation: O Allah, provide for me from Your bounty.

duas.title: Dua for the Strength to Endure
duas.translation: O Allah, strengthen me in times of trials.

duas.title: Dua for Wisdom
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me wisdom.

duas.title: Dua for the Safety of Family
duas.translation: O Allah, protect my family.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Evil Eye
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من العين
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil eye.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sickness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me a speedy recovery.

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness in Faith
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me firm in my religion.

duas.title: Dua for Increased Blessings
duas.translation: O Allah, increase me from Your bounty.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Marriage
duas.translation: O Allah, bless my marriage.

duas.title: Dua for Patience
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the patient.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Deception
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from deception.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart tranquil.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Hellfire
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the people of Jannah.

duas.title: Dua for Happiness in this World and the Next
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من أهل الدنيا والآخرة
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the people of both this world and the next.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance on the Right Path
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me to Your straight path.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Arrogance
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from arrogance.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fears
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخوف
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah's Protection
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شرور الناس
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evils of people.

duas.title: Dua for the Best of This World and the Next
duas.arabic: اللهم آتنا في الدنيا حسنة وفي الآخرة حسنة
duas.translation: O Allah, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter.

duas.title: Dua for Safe Travels
duas.translation: O Allah, make my journey easy.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Enemies
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from my enemies.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah's Forgiveness
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me.

duas.title: Dua for Restoring the Lost
duas.arabic: اللهم رُد لي ما ضاع مني
duas.translation: O Allah, return to me what I have lost.

duas.title: Dua for the Protection of Wealth
duas.translation: O Allah, make my wealth blessed.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Betrayal
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me far from betrayal.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Shaitan
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the accursed devil.

duas.title: Dua for a Peaceful Death
duas.translation: O Allah, make my death in faith.

duas.title: Dua for Good Memory
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me a strong memory.

duas.title: Dua for a Grateful Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart grateful.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Difficult Situations
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from all evil.

duas.title: Dua for Avoiding Sin
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me away from sins.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Debt
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve me of my debts.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخوف
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness for Parents
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive my parents.

duas.title: Dua for a Blessed Life
duas.translation: O Allah, make my life blessed.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Work
duas.translation: O Allah, bless my work.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart in peace.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من القلق
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety.

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Difficult Times
duas.translation: O Allah, make my difficulties easy.

duas.title: Dua for Good Friends
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me a righteous friend.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful People
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from every harm.

duas.title: Dua for the Removal of Sins
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive my sins.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Family
duas.translation: O Allah, bless my family.

duas.title: Dua for Good Health
duas.translation: O Allah, make me in good health.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Negative Thoughts
duas.translation: O Allah, remove the whispers from my heart.

duas.title: Dua for a Good Death
duas.translation: O Allah, make my end a good one.

duas.title: Dua for Strength to Overcome Trials
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me strength in times of trial.

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the grateful ones.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah’s Mercy
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy on me.

duas.title: Dua for Avoiding Arrogance
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from arrogance.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Eyes
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil eye.

duas.title: Dua for Making Things Easy
duas.translation: O Allah, make things easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Life
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me contentment.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah’s Forgiveness
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me for what has passed.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Tests
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الناجحين في الامتحانات
duas.translation: O Allah, make me successful in my exams.

duas.title: Dua for Parents
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعل والديّ من أهل الجنة
duas.translation: O Allah, make my parents among the people of Jannah.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sickness
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me far from illness.

duas.title: Dua for Avoiding the Evil of the Day
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر هذا اليوم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Enemies
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from my enemies.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Society
duas.translation: O Allah, make our society peaceful.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Knowledge
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my knowledge.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sin
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me away from sin.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah’s Help
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your assistance.

duas.title: Dua for Being Free from Debt
duas.translation: O Allah, provide for me from Your bounty.

duas.title: Dua for Prosperity
duas.translation: O Allah, make my sustenance abundant.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah’s Protection
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شرور الناس
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evils of people.

duas.title: Dua for Strength in Faith
duas.translation: O Allah, make me steadfast in my religion.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Evil of Others
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شرور الآخرين
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of others.

duas.title: Dua for Repentance
duas.translation: O Allah, accept my repentance.

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Every Task
duas.translation: O Allah, ease every difficulty for me.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Business
duas.translation: O Allah, make my work successful.

duas.title: Dua for Financial Stability
duas.translation: O Allah, make my wealth stable.

duas.title: Dua for Finding Peace in Life
duas.translation: O Allah, make my life full of peace.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in the Grave
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me in my grave.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Anger
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who forgive.

duas.title: Dua for Protecting Family
duas.arabic: اللهم احفظ عائلتي من كل شر
duas.translation: O Allah, protect my family from every harm.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Life
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my life.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Disease
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين يعافون من الأمراض
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who are spared from diseases.

duas.title: Dua for Easing Financial Burden
duas.translation: O Allah, ease my sustenance for me.

duas.title: Dua for Good Sleep
duas.translation: O Allah, make my sleep a source of comfort.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful People
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر الناس
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the harm of people.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah’s Help
duas.translation: O Allah, I place my trust in You.

duas.title: Dua for Success in This Life and the Next
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الفائزين في الدنيا والآخرة
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the successful in this world and the Hereafter.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Wrongdoers
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the oppression of wrongdoers.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart content and at peace.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Debt
duas.translation: O Allah, enrich me with what is lawful and save me from what is unlawful.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance in Life
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me to that which You love and are pleased with.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Heart Disease
duas.translation: O Allah, purify my heart from polytheism.

duas.title: Dua for Strength in Trials
duas.arabic: اللهم امنحني القوة على تحمل البلاء
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me the strength to endure trials.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in Relationships
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعل علاقتي مع الناس مليئة بالسلام
duas.translation: O Allah, make my relationships with people full of peace.

duas.title: Dua for Overcoming Difficulties
duas.translation: O Allah, make every difficult thing easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Long Life with Good Health
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعل حياتي مليئة بالصحة والعافية
duas.translation: O Allah, make my life full of health and well-being.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Poverty
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the wealthy.

duas.title: Dua for Mercy on the Day of Judgment
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy on me on the Day of Judgment.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Protection from the Devil
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر الشيطان
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of the devil.

duas.title: Dua for Helping the Needy
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين يساعدون الفقراء
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who help the poor.

duas.title: Dua for Reconciliation
duas.translation: O Allah, bring reconciliation between us.

duas.title: Dua for Removal of Worries
duas.translation: O Allah, remove my worries.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Refuge from Disobedience
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من المعاصي
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disobedience.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Pain
duas.translation: O Allah, heal me from all pain.

duas.title: Dua for Asking Allah’s Help in Hardship
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who supplicate to You.

duas.title: Dua for Inner Peace
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me inner peace.

duas.title: Dua for Fulfillment of Needs
duas.translation: O Allah, fulfill my needs.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Envy
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of the envious.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Blessings
duas.translation: O Allah, bless my work.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين لا يخافون
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who are not afraid.

duas.title: Dua for Removal of Hardships
duas.translation: O Allah, make every difficulty easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance in Speech
duas.translation: O Allah, make my tongue moist with Your remembrance.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Life
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الناجحين في حياتي
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the successful ones in my life.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from the Evil of the Day
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر اليوم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of the day.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Knowledge
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my knowledge.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Oppression
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين لا يظلمون
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who do not oppress.

duas.title: Dua for Success in Education
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الناجحين في دراستي
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the successful ones in my studies.

duas.title: Dua for Safe Return from Journey
duas.translation: O Allah, make me in Your protection.

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Life
duas.translation: O Allah, make me content with what I have.

duas.title: Dua for Trust in Allah
duas.translation: O Allah, I put my trust in You.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance in Decision Making
duas.translation: O Allah, make my affairs easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sickness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body.

duas.title: Dua for Strength and Patience
duas.arabic: اللهم صبرني على ما ابتليتني به
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me patience with what You have tested me with.

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness in Religion
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me firm in Your obedience.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Eye
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر عين الحاسد
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil eye of the envious.

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the grateful ones.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Hellfire
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلنا من أهل الجنة ووقنا عذاب النار
duas.translation: O Allah, make us from the people of Jannah and protect us from the punishment of the Hellfire.

duas.title: Dua for Sustenance
duas.arabic: اللهم رزقني من حيث لا أحتسب
duas.translation: O Allah, provide me from sources I cannot imagine.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Trials
duas.arabic: اللهم احفظني من كل شر وفتنة
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from every harm and trial.

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Difficult Times
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve me of my worries.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Arrogance
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of my own soul.

duas.title: Dua for Good Health
duas.translation: O Allah, make my health a cure.

duas.title: Dua for Financial Ease
duas.translation: O Allah, make my sustenance from lawful sources.

duas.title: Dua for Strength in Religion
duas.translation: O Allah, strengthen me in my religion.

duas.title: Dua for Wisdom
duas.translation: O Allah, grant us knowledge from Yourself.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Grief
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the patient ones.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive my sins.

duas.title: Dua for Love and Harmony
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلنا من أهل المودة والرحمة
duas.translation: O Allah, make us among the people of love and mercy.

duas.title: Dua for Knowledge and Success
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me beneficial knowledge.

duas.title: Dua for Safety in Travels
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسالك في سفري هذا السلامة
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for safety in this journey.

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Adversity
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who are patient.

duas.title: Dua for Peace of Mind
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart peaceful with Your remembrance.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from All Harm
duas.arabic: اللهم احفظني من شر كل دابة
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of every creature.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Anxiety
duas.translation: O Allah, remove my worry from me.

duas.title: Dua for Righteousness
duas.translation: O Allah, make me from Your righteous servants.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Anger
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين لا يغضبون
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who do not get angry.

duas.title: Dua for Mercy
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy on me with Your power.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in Family
duas.translation: O Allah, make my house a blessed house.

duas.title: Dua for the Deceased
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive our deceased.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Actions
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر أعمالي
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of my actions.

duas.title: Dua for Overcoming Difficulties
duas.translation: O Allah, make my affairs easy.

duas.title: Dua for Family
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلنا من أهل البيت الطاهرين
duas.translation: O Allah, make us among the pure family.

duas.title: Dua for Hope
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who are hopeful.

duas.title: Dua for the Oppressed
duas.translation: O Allah, give victory to the oppressed.

duas.title: Dua for Healing
duas.arabic: اللهم اشفني شفاءً لا يغادر سقماً
duas.translation: O Allah, heal me with a healing that leaves no sickness.

duas.title: Dua for Happiness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me happiness.

duas.title: Dua for Financial Success
duas.translation: O Allah, open the doors of Your sustenance for me.

duas.title: Dua for Contentment
duas.translation: O Allah, make me content.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Enemies
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of enemies.

duas.title: Dua for Comfort in Times of Grief
duas.arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين يسترجعون في المصيبة
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who say 'Indeed we belong to Allah and to Him is our return' in times of calamity.

duas.title: Dua for Light in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, place light in my heart.

duas.title: Dua for Wisdom in Judgment
duas.translation: O Allah, inspire me with wisdom in my decisions.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Distress
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve me from my distress.

duas.title: Dua for Guidance
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the accursed devil.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me.

duas.title: Dua for Success
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسالك من فضلك ورحمتك
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your bounty and mercy.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harm
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with Whose name nothing on earth or in the heavens can harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Anxiety
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow.

duas.title: Dua for Health
duas.arabic: اللهم اشفني شفاءً لا يغادر سقماً
duas.translation: O Allah, heal me with a healing that leaves no sickness.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Poverty
duas.arabic: اللهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك واغنني بفضلك عن من سواك
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with Your lawful provisions and keep me away from unlawful ones, and enrich me with Your grace.

duas.title: Dua for Good Health
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me health and wellness.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر ما عملت ومن شر ما لم أعمل
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and the evil of what I have not done.

duas.title: Dua for the Sick
duas.arabic: اللهم رب الناس أذهب الباس، اشفِ أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal, for You are the Healer, and there is no healing except Your healing.

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Difficulties
duas.arabic: اللهم لا سهل إلا ما جعلته سهلاً
duas.translation: O Allah, there is no ease except that which You make easy.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge.

duas.title: Dua for Safety from Calamities
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الجوع، فإنه بئس الضجيع
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from hunger, for it is an evil companion.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Sustenance
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my sustenance.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Enemies
duas.arabic: اللهم احفظني من بين يدي ومن خلفي
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from what is before me and behind me.

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness
duas.translation: O Allah, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

duas.title: Dua for Parents
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents.

duas.title: Dua for Good Character
duas.translation: O Allah, improve our character.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Influences
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شرور الناس
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evils of people.

duas.title: Dua for Making Things Easy
duas.translation: O Allah, make my affairs easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Asking for Allah’s Mercy
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy upon me with Your power.

duas.title: Dua for Strength in Faith
duas.translation: O Allah, make me firm in my faith.

duas.title: Dua for Happiness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me happiness.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Refuge from Discontent
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الكفر والفقر
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty.

duas.title: Dua for Calmness of Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart tranquil with Your remembrance.

duas.title: Dua for Light in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, place light in my heart.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Stress
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve me of my worry.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Home
duas.translation: O Allah, make my home a blessed home.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in Journey
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسالك في سفري هذا البر والتقوى
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for righteousness and piety during this journey.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Arrogance
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of my own soul.

duas.title: Dua for Avoiding Sin
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من كل معصية
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from every sin.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Financial Stress
duas.translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your sustenance.

duas.title: Dua for Overcoming Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخوف
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear.

duas.title: Dua for Patience
duas.translation: O Allah, make me of the patient ones.
